column5: I've been looking for a trip next August for some musky and walleye fishing. I was wondering if anyone has had any experience w/ Moosehorn Lodge by Sioux Lookout before. I've heard it's pretty close to Lac Seul for good musky fishing, and that the walleye fishing is also pretty good there. Any information would be appreciated. Thanks.

Musky Mama (Linda Rice) and Carter Rice own the place. Greg Marino is probably the best Musky guide in the area. These people know that area of Lac Seul better than everyone. They will put you on big fish.
